title: Another dumb question
content: Do some people at PESU complete their 4 yrs [b.tech](http://b.tech) course in 3-3.5 yrs ?

comments.body: No but some complete 4 year course in 5-7 years
Damn, pes people get backlogs? Won't the best crowd come there for cse.. Don't they study there?

depends from person to person. I know a person who got into IIT Guwahati but passed out a year or 2 later than his batchmates, some. people dont study that much after getting into college, drugs also play a role.. many things tbh. Just cause you score a good rank anoll doesnt mean youll do extremely well in college

>know a person who got into IIT Guwahati but passed out a year or 2 later than his batchmates

Ayo, can u elaborate? 

>Just cause you score a good rank anoll doesnt mean youll do extremely well in college

ðŸ™‚ðŸ™‚ I'm scared..

well, he got into weed and other drugs. He didnt have a good friend group basically, all that shit caused him to fall behind.

Dw bro, just work hard in college. I dont have much knowledge abt this but afaik, youll learn as you progress in college
Yes i knew a guy who made a time machine for his project and used it to travel back and finish his college course in 1 year
XD, I mean is the course structured in that way, or the crowd isn't really interested in doing it ?

This is actually not a dumb question :D  
You cannot graduate early at PES. Each semester has a minimum number of credits you need to enroll for (including final year semesters)

I remember this guy!

Such a smart man
So any updates on my application?
Working on it bro, takes some time
